lead_paragraph: Britain's financial regulator is talking to 25 potential new banks as part of moves to increase competition within the sector, the country's economic secretary said on Tuesday.

headline.main: UK Regulator Talking to 25 Potential New Banks - Lawmaker
headline.print_headline: UK Regulator Talking to 25 Potential New Banks - Lawmaker

snippet: Britain's financial regulator is talking to 25 potential new banks as part of moves to increase competition within the sector, the country's economic secretary said on Tuesday....
